question: Choose the correct analogy! Child is to human as:
Which word isn’t like the others?
How many birthdays does the average person have?
Determine which number best completes the following sequence: 1, 2, 4, 7, 11, ?, 22.
Which of these animals is least like the others?
Take a look at the following sequence: A Z B Y C X D W E. Which letter completes the sequence?
Pick the set of words where each word has a different meaning when the first letter is capitalized.
Which three numbers give you the same result when you add them or when you multiply them?
At a swim meet, Alan wasn’t first or last. Jane beat Alan. Alan beat Morgan. Gina wasn’t first or last. Gina beat Kevin. Morgan beat Gina. Who came in last?
Rita went to visit Rachel. Rachel is Rita’s only husband’s mother-in-law’s only husband’s only daughter’s only daughter. What relation is Rachel to Rita?
